summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting an update to the 'Epstein Universe' with victim attorney information, expressing concern about keeping track of the high volume of witnesses.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting updates to victim attorney information in the Epstein case tracking system.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Address of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York

keyFacts: Prosecutors were maintaining a tracking system called 'Epstein Universe' to organize case information.
There was concern about the high volume of witnesses in the Epstein case.
Prosecutors needed to systematically track victim attorney information to avoid confusion.
The email suggests coordination challenges in managing the complex Epstein investigation.
